content.question: Six identical resistors are connected to a battery in a circuit, as shown in the figure. Each resistor has resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, and the battery has a potential difference <math alttext="delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></math>. What is the total current produced by the battery?

choices.label: <math alttext="one sixth times open parenthesis, the fraction delta V over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="two thirds times open parenthesis, the fraction delta V over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="three halves times open parenthesis, the fraction delta V over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="6 times open parenthesis, the fraction delta V over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="three halves times open parenthesis, the fraction delta V over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
